Text: hve you ever heard of sharky's machine any chance ????
awesome! i requested this a while back so i am very happy to see it. one more classic i can't seem to find is ronin if anybodies got it.

Ronin is NASTY!

but not as nasty as AAAAAARNOLD!!!! haha, good shit.
Is this an anamorphic DVD or is it the original, non-anamorphic version with black bars on all 4 sides?
NM, just saw in description it isn't. This is the one Arnold movie in my collection that I hate because of the anamorphic issue.
This is the non animorphic version I hope this is what you were looking for... or were you looking for the anamorphic?
@Meez714 - Never heard of that movie but I will keep an eye out for it.

I don't guess they ever got around to releasing an anamorphic version on DVD, not an issue with bluray.

Non-anamorphic DVDs generally look bad on HDTVs.
I beg to differ. I watched it on my HD and it actually looked really solid. My friend and I both even made comment on it about how good it looked while being an unmastered film.

Unmastered film?

What does that even mean? This DVD is well known in the HT Forum community as being  a non-anamorphic low quality release. I was hoping they finally released an anamorphic version but the chances are slim with Bluray now taking over.
Thank you! Downloading for a friend. Speed looks nice too.
